DOC.brief_title: Assessing Patient Comfort With Two Different Multi-Purpose Disinfecting Solutions
DOC.detailed_description: According recent survey contact lens fitter , prescribe treatment contact lens dryness : frequent replacement schedule ( 24 % ) , refit different material ( 23 % ) , rewetting drop ( 21 % ) change care system ( 15 % ) . Changing care system standard treatment CL discomfort many year . In survey , 30 % practitioner felt absolutely difference among solution respect reduce dryness discomfort . The investigator set compare clinical performance two solution : AMO 's RevitaLens Alcon 's Opti-Free PureMoist .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Between age 18 inclusive . 2 . Males females 3 . Patient generally good & stable overall health . 4 . Patient likely comply study guideline & study visit . 5 . Informed consent sign . 6 . Are willing/able return require study visit . 7 . Are willing/able follow instruction study investigator his/her staff . 8 . Have sign informed consent approve Institutional Review Board Independent Ethics Committee . 1 . Corneal refractive surgery within 6 month study . 2 . Intraocular surgery within 6 month ocular laser surgery within 6 month . 3 . Ocular pathology ( include glaucoma cataract ) , could impact result and/or place patient risk .
